page.title: 13Riding
page.content: On Sundays I go riding if the stables are open.I go to Laughton Riding Stables at half-past one or two-o-clock and get back between half past three and quarter to four.It costs only Â£1.00,but it depends how far we go.We usually go in the forest for a ride because it is shady for the horses in summer.In winter we go on the roads .My favourite horse is Pinnochio.He is really a pony,and is 11.2 hands high.Margaret who is in charge of the stables said that I could enter shows on him,in the sections for the best turned out pony.
